hero.title: Diaphantium
hero.description: Powerful userscript for Tanki Online with customizable hotkeys, auto-clicking, and supply management. Built for efficiency and control.

quickstart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickstart.description: Get up and running with Diaphantium in just three simple steps

step1.title: Install Tampermonkey
step1.description: Download and install the Tampermonkey browser extension from the official website.

step2.title: Add Script
step2.description: Click the download button to add Diaphantium script to your Tampermonkey dashboard.

step3.title: Configure Settings
step3.descriptionContinued: to open the popup menu and customize your hotkeys in the Settings page.

features.title: Powerful Automation
features.description: Everything you need for efficient gameplay automation

autoClicker.title: Auto Clicker
autoClicker.description: Automated clicking functionality with customizable intervals and precise timing control.

hotkeys.title: Customizable Hotkeys
hotkeys.description: Configure your own keyboard shortcuts for quick access and seamless workflow integration.

supplies.title: Supply Management
supplies.description: Automated supply activation and management for optimized gameplay efficiency.

settings.title: Advanced Settings
settings.description: Fine-tune every aspect of the script to your preferences with comprehensive configuration options.

about.title: Professional Automation Tool
about.subtitle: Built for Tanki Online Players
about.description: Diaphantium is a free, open-source userscript that enhances your Tanki Online experience with automated actions, customizable hotkeys, and efficient supply management. Born from the idea of creating a simple popup interface for continuous key input, it has evolved into a comprehensive automation solution.
about.whyDescription: This project demonstrates advanced front-end development skills including CSS animations, JavaScript programming, cross-browser compatibility, and user experience design. It showcases the ability to reverse-engineer existing interfaces and create comprehensive visual overhauls while maintaining functionality.

v1.title: Version 1.0 - The Beginning
v1.description: The initial release introduced a basic popup window with essential auto-clicking functionality. The interface was simple but functional, laying the foundation for future improvements.

v2.title: Version 2.0 - Dual Interface
v2.description: Added two-tab system with Main and Settings tabs. Improved window dragging mechanics - users could now move the popup by any part except input fields. Enhanced visual design with better color schemes.

v3.title: Version 3.0 - Pro Features
v3.description: Major overhaul with over 150 commits. Introduced navigation buttons, battle selection system, and advanced features like nickname blur and skip login. Added support for both team battles and deathmatch modes.

v4.title: Version 4.0 - Modern Era
v4.description: Complete redesign with mobile support, dynamic hotkey management, and improved UI. Added ability to remove hotkeys, duplicate hotkey detection with visual warnings, and comprehensive changelog tracking.

console.title: Console Output
console.description: See Diaphantium in action with real-time console simulation
console.tipFull: Tip: To open the actual Diaphantium popup, install the script and press F2 on Tanki Online

footer.description: Professional open-source automation tool built with modern web technologies. Enhance your Tanki Online gameplay with customizable hotkeys and advanced features.
